original_text: The days will come upon you when your enemies will build an embankment against you and encircle you and hem you in on every side.
korean_text: 날이 이를지라 네 원수들이 토둔을 쌓고 너를 둘러 사면으로 가두고

sentences.original_text: The days will come upon you
when your enemies will build an embankment against you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 원수들이 너를 대적하여 흉벽을 쌓을 때이며

sentences.original_text: and hem you in on every side
